name: Aquaman Collection
overview: Aquaman Collection includes two action–fantasy films from the DC Universe, centered on Arthur Curry, a half-human, half-Atlantean hero. The series explores underwater kingdoms, epic battles, and themes of legacy and leadership. With stunning visuals and dynamic storytelling, it offers a bold cinematic dive into the world of Atlantis.

parts.overview: Half-human, half-Atlantean Arthur Curry is taken on the journey of his lifetime to discover if he is worth of being a king.
parts.title: Aquaman

parts.overview: Black Manta seeks revenge on Aquaman for his father's death. Wielding the Black Trident's power, he becomes a formidable foe. To defend Atlantis, Arthur (Aquaman) forges an alliance with his imprisoned brother. They must protect the kingdom.
parts.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
